title: Why I Love League of Legends But Hate Playing It - found this on my facebook

embed.description: This video was created to describe my feelings towards the state of our League, I once enjoyed playing this game despite winning or losing, but now it has became hurtful at times. This Spoken word was done by Jesse Chisholm, and the video was created by KodeVu.

body:
Someone posted this on their facebook. Thought it was pretty good. Thought id share

Edit: above link i accidentally pasted is 2.53 in.

http://youtu.be/nxAabW7JfTQ - from start

replies.body: It's been posted so many times I despise it now. it's a good message but seeing that thumbnail pisses me off.

This video is so true I can relate to every single second of it. I want that good old feeling back when no one knew what to do, where I maxed w on zed and played ad taric. Now all everyone ever seems to want is abuse all the op champs and win. Even when I try to smurf for that feeling again, I am matched with 9 other smurfs every game. Worst part of all, I feel like I am slowly turning into a player which I am trying not to become.

Ranked has changed me as a person.
Saw this a while back. Really good stuff.
This is a great message to get out to the community. Watch the whole video, rather than from 2:53 and I'm sure you will agree.
yeah thats my bad. i cant seem to change the link. :/
It's the t=173 parameter on the link, since 173 seconds is 2 minutes and 53 seconds. Still, it's not a bad place to start. Like a tl;dr for a video. tl;dw maybe?
